member.name: M:CityInfo.API.Controllers.CitiesController.GetCities
member.summary: This shows the list of all the cities and the information including points of views information.

member.name: M:CityInfo.API.Controllers.CitiesController.GetCity(System.Int32)
member.summary: This will provide information about a specific city.

member.name: M:CityInfo.API.Controllers.PointOfInterestController.GetPointsOfInterst(System.Int32)
member.summary: This will provide points of interests of a specific city.

member.name: M:CityInfo.API.Controllers.PointOfInterestController.GetPointOfInterest(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: This will provide points of interests of a specific city and a specific point of interest.
